amendment.description: Amendment requires the Comptroller General to conduct a study on the effects of the legislations' efforts for veteran owned businesses. The Comptroller must also include recommendations as to how the Federal government can more effectively serve veteran owned businesses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 111-121 to require a study by the Comptroller General to look at the effects of the legislation's efforts for veteran owned businesses. The Comptroller must also include recommendations as to how the Federal government can more effectively serve veteran owned businesses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Paulsen amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
